name: com.xpturn.polyfill
description: Runtime polyfill for C# 9·10·11 syntax (record, init, required, interpolated strings, etc.) in Unity. Provides BCL types and Editor support for -langversion and .csproj LangVersion auto-configuration.

samples.description: Contains sample code and assets for the Polyfill library.
Contains Tests code and assets for the Polyfill library.
